content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator: ''
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0603
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when parent record exists and DECOD ^= null, and --OBJ
  does not equal --DECOD
Outcome:
  Message: -OBJ does not equal --DECOD of the parent record
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0603
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: When findings are collected about an event or intervention,
                  and the name of the event or intervention is collected in an "Other,
                  specify" CRF field, the value in --OBJ variable depends on whether
                  the FA record has a parent record and whether the "Other, specify"
                  value was coded.
                Document: SDTMIG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.7.4
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - FA

json.Description: Raise an error when parent record exists and DECOD ^= null, and --OBJ does not equal --DECOD

Outcome.Message: -OBJ does not equal --DECOD of the parent record

Citations.Cited_Guidance: When findings are collected about an event or intervention, and the name of the event or intervention is collected in an "Other, specify" CRF field, the value in --OBJ variable depends on whether the FA record has a parent record and whether the "Other, specify" value was coded.
